basic_information.scholarship_name: Jafar Farzaneh Endowed Scholarship for International Students

description: This scholarship is available to International students who meet the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Must be an International student who is Iranian, whose family is Iranian, or from a war-torn Middle Eastern country in the order of Syria, Palestine, Iraq, Afghanistan, or Yemen Must have a cumulative GPA of 3.0 or above Must be a full-time student in good standing with the University This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: ADV_FarzanehCountryList is Iran   or ADV_FarzanehCountryList is Syria   or ADV_FarzanehCountryList is Palestine   or ADV_FarzanehCountryList is Iraq   or ADV_FarzanehCountryList is Afghanistan   or ADV_FarzanehCountryList is Yemen
